alert.note: Alert for Perry (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued April 13 at 9:17AM CDT until further notice by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1230 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of southwest Alabama and southeast Mississippi, including the following counties, in southwest Alabama, Mobile and Washington. In southeast Mississippi, Greene, Perry and Wayne. * WHEN...Until 1230 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 917 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to strong showers. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Citronelle, Richton, Leakesville, Clara, Deer Park, Beaumont, New Augusta, McLain, State Line, Fruitdale, Byrd, Avera, Jonathan, Bradley, Bothwell, Neely, Sand Hill, Clark, Hillman and Piave.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
